product_name: REI Midweight Long Underwear Print Bottoms - Toddler Girls'
long_description: When your toddler needs an extra layer of warmth for playing in the snow or cool weather, the cozy and soft REI Midweight long underwear print bottoms are just the thing she needs. Polyester fabric draws moisture away from the skin and dries quickly; fabric provides UPF 50+ protection from harmful solar rays. A touch of spandex offers stretch and helps the bottoms hold their shape; peached finish adds softness. Flat seams eliminate bulk while rib-knit ankle cuffs help seal out cold; gusseted crotch allows full range of motion.
short_description: When your toddler needs an extra layer of warmth for playing in the snow or cool weather, the cozy and soft REI Midweight long underwear print bottoms are just the thing she needs.
